message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $10,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
